title: Three Into One
description: What is difference?Is it in how we speak,How we lookOr how we see the world?Is it the colour of our eyesThe swing of our walkOr the very essence ofOur minds?Whatever it isMaybe we should embrace itRather than wanting toRun awayOr kill it.Next time there isDifferenceThink,What about me,How do they see me,Do I care?Should I care?What in the end doWe need butLoveAndAcceptance.Regardless of change.Cover design: Julie Elizabeth PowellImage: freedigitalphotos.net
author: Julie Elizabeth Powell
